title: David Schwimmer waits for Friends in New York City
text:
Friends star David Schwimmer is embracing the mood as well (Picture: Mega)

Ross Gellar once tried to explain the importance of Unagi, what he believed was the state of total awareness.

And it looks like Friends star David Schwimmer is embracing the mood as well.

Snapped out and about in Soho, New York City the Friends star was caught waiting outside a shop front before moving to lean against a telephone pole, with his phone in hand.

Looks like he may have finally achieved ‘true unagi’.

Wrapped up warm in a zip-up hoodie and puffer jacket with jeans and trainers, the TV star tried to keep a low profile with a baseball cap pulled low over his head.

David Schwimmer patiently waits for a Friend (Picture: Mega)

Has David achieved a state of unagi? (Picture: Mega)

His outing comes after an epic reunion with his Friends co-stars which literally broke Instagram.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Yep, his long-time pal Jennifer Aniston finally joined the world of Instagram and wasted no time in giving the people what they want, as she shared a shot from a recent get together with her former sitcom co-stars as they gathered around her camera in a living room during recent celebrations.

True unagi (Picture: Mega)

David wrapped up warm in but kept a low profile with a baseball cap (Picture: Mega)

Previously Courteney Cox (who played Monica) shared a shot of her hanging with Matt LeBlanc (Joey) and Jen (Rachel), as the three caught up.

But Jen’s post revealed that the whole cast, along with Matthew Perry (Chandler), David (Ross) and Lisa Kudrow (Phoebe) were also present, hiding on the other side of the lens.

They’re there for you (Picture: Instagram)

Jen managed to crash the site as she debuted her account with the actress racking up 6.9 million followers in less than 24 hours, and her first post – that selfie – with over 14 million likes so far.

A host of celebs welcomed Jennifer to Instagram, and she added them all to her story – y’know, just to show off how many famous pals she has.

David was one of the first to get in on the action, posting a pic of Rachel and Ross in lego form to greet his former castmate, with Jen writing: ‘Hi Schwimmy!’
